code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import"./BottomNav.css";import{FaHome,FaTicketAlt,FaHeart,FaMapMarkedAlt,FaCube}from"react-icons/fa";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavItem=_ref=>{let{icon,active=false,onClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item ".concat(active?"active":""),onClick:onClick,children:icon});};const BottomNav=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState(location.pathname);const handleNavigation=path=>{navigate(path);setActiveTab(path);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bottom-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHome,{}),active:activeTab==='/home',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/home')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTicketAlt,{}),active:activeTab==='/booking',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/booking')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHeart,{}),active:activeTab==='/favorites',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/favorites')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaMapMarkedAlt,{}),active:activeTab==='/map',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/map')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCube,{}),active:activeTab==='/more',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/more')})]});};export default BottomNav;
